```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
poll_results <- house_elections%>%
  filter(party == "R"| party == "D")%>%
  mutate(Total_votes = general_votes + primary_votes) 
```

```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
northeast <- poll_results%>%
 filter(state %in% c("CT","MA","NH","NJ","NY","PA"))
```
graph 2
```{r}
poll_graph <- ggplot(northeast, aes(x = "CT","MA","NH","NJ","NY","PA" , y = Total_votes, fill = party)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge")+
  xlab("State")+
  ylab("Total Votes") + facet_wrap(~state) + scale_fill_manual(values=c("BLUE", "RED"))
  
poll_graph
```





```{r}
northeast <- poll_results%>%
 filter(state %in% c("CT","ME","MA","NH","RI","VT","NJ","NY","PA"))%>%
  summarize( Northeast = sum(Total_votes))
```
